title: CreativeMarket - Pop Art Photoshop Action 788123
description:
Double click on the action file and it will be installed in your Photoshop... Open the action window... (WindowActions)

Open your picture and click on the action! Easy as that!

This action has been tested countless of times on pictures, so that only one action can be used on all types of photos!

Although this action can be used in all types of photos, it gives best results in clean portraits. It is also non-destructive so it does not harm the original photo in any way. This effect were all achieved by using the adjustment layers and smart objects/filters so if you need to change the effect, you don't need to change the actions, just simply tweak it a bit. play around with the brightness/contrast or curves and increase or decrease the intensity of the effect by changing the settings in the smart filter. Color can be changed with Hue/Sat adjustment layer called "Change the color!"

Keep in mind that Pictures are very delicate things.sometimes it may not come out so well as on other photos, this is because of the difference in picture quality, lighting, tone and so on... So please avoid using it on pictures that have very dark tone, as the effect might not come out so well.
 
https://creativemarket.com/IngeniousArtist/788123-Pop-Art-Photoshop-Action
